1: <pb/><t>Li Qaawa' na'awab'ejink,</t> <t>tiqto rik'in xnimal xloq'al;</t> <t>sutsu li Qaawa' xb'aan xnimal xwankil.</t> <t>A'an kik'ojob'ank re li ruuchich'och' sa' xna'aj,</t> <t>re naq ink'a' taa'eek'anq chi junajwa.</t>
2: <t>Chalen chaq sa' xtiklajik ak k'ojk'o laak'ojarib'aal sa' xna'aj;</t> <t>chalen chaq junxil ak wankat laa'at.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Kaw neke'eek'ank eb' li nima', at Qaawa';</t> <t>k'ajo' naq na'aakanak xyaab' li nima',</t> <t>tz'aapixik wi' rab'inkil li xkaw oq.</t>
4: <t>A'ut jwal nim laawankil, at Qaawa',</t> <t>chiru li xyaab' li k'iila nima' ut li xkaw oq li palaw;</t> <t>jwal nim laawankil sa' choxa, at Qaawa'.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Q'axal yaal chixjunil laawaatin;</t> <t>laasantilal naxchaab'ilob'resi laawochoch</t> <t>chi junelik q'e kutan, at Qaawa'!</t>
